lead_paragraph: The Olympic women’s discus champion Natalya Sadova of Russia was barred for two years yesterday by the International Association of Athletics Federations, track and field’s world governing body, for a second doping violation.
snippet: The Olympic women’s discus champion Natalya Sadova of Russia was barred for two years yesterday by the International Association of Athletics Federations, track and field’s world governing body, for a second doping violation.
